EmailTemplate.name: Conference Nurturing 4
EmailTemplate.subject: T Minus 0: Wine, Cheese or Chocolate?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Conference attendee}}, I'd like to talk to you about MBO at the conference, and I'm willing to part with wine, cheese and chocolate to make it happen. Meet MBO at our reception tonight in the Cuvee Room at ENO Wine Bar, 5:30 to 8. See you there, Jay ___________________________________ Jay Lash VP of Market Strategies MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6005 e: jlash@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
